title: Sepp Kuss makes history as first American male in a decade to wear a leader’s jersey at a grand tour
content:
Colorado climber dons first US elite men's leader’s jersey since Chris Horner won the 2013 Vuelta a España. Will he be next?

Read the full article at Sepp Kuss makes history as first American male in a decade to wear a leader’s jersey at a grand tour on Velo.
author: ahood
